committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, Reserved Water and Resource Conservation

official_title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act by designating a segment of the Black Creek in Mississippi as a component of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.

summary.text: (Measure indefinitely postponed in Senate) Amends the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate Black Creek, Mississippi, as a component ofthe National Wild and Scenic Rivers System. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act by designating a segment of the Black Creek in Mississippi as a component of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.
